MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH64 postcode area of Burton, affecting properties in The Village and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.58pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:07pm on 13th March 2021
